```{r,eval=TRUE,echo=FALSE,results="asis"}
.doc_arg(
    type = paste(.doc_fmt_cslist(.doc_type_character(), .doc_type_function(), .doc_value_NULL(), last = " or "), "(See above.)"),
    default = "default",
    description =
        c(
            "The print method to use for the",
            .doc_r6class(),
            "to be defined.",
            "May be one of the following:",
            .doc_tbl(
                rbind(
                    c(
                        paste(
                            '`"none"` or', .doc_value_NULL()
                        ),
                        paste(
                            "No own print method is specified.",
                            "The parent class' print method is inherited."
                        )
                    ),
                    c(
                        paste(
                            '`"default"`'
                        ),
                        paste0(
                            "A default print method is used."
                        )
                    ),
                    c(.doc_type_function(), "The provided function will be used as print method.")
                ),
                width = c(90, 40)
            )
        )
)

cat("\n\n**The `\"default\"` print method**\n<br>\n") 
cat("takes the same arguments as")
.doc_ref_method(topic="R6Member",tag="print")
cat(", namely",.doc_fmt_cslist(paste0("`",names(formals(R6Member$public_methods$print)),"`")),".")
cat("\n<br>\nIt generates output like in the following example:\n<br>")

R6Class_example <- R6MemberList_example$R6Class("ExampleR6Class")$new()
cat("\\preformatted{\n\n")
R6Class_example$print()
cat("}\n\n")


rm(list = "R6Class_example")
```
